short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the caption that Twiiter shows when displaying media.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When watching videos on Twitter, the caption/tweet overlaps the media provider's controls. For example, when watching a Vimeo video, it is impossible to pause, rewind or forward. This extension provides a way to toggle the visibility of the media caption on the page.
